channel.title: Racism? Mature Discussion!
channel.description:
Is it right? Wrong? I personally think it's wrong because not all people of a race are the same, and deserve to be put down just because there skin is a certain color?
NO FLAMING! MATURE DISCUSSION PLEASE.

item.title: Racism? Mature Discussion!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

When a meme starts it grows in the prime sector that it was made. From there on out it’s value decreases as others find out about it. We are the others where as “niggers” are the origin of their personality. We are so far out of context with them pertaining to culture, skin tone, apearel, etc. That we alienate them and generalize everything about them. If you join a community such as 4chan and you grow onto them that is your choice, no one elses. Some people dislike the negative demeanor 4chan holds, and alienate them and generalize their culture with others. Racism is the missinterpretation of humanity. It is the umbrella of ignorance the binds around completely irrelevant subjects. To generalize a demeanor over a whole race is unrealistic and anyone who does so must look in the mirror and see if they are able to generalize themselves with the rest of the world. We are individuals.

Read full topic

item.title: Racism? Mature Discussion!
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:74, topic:374445”]Now some black people, they do bring it on themselves. When you walk around shooting people and acting all big like a “nigger”, what do you expect the white community to do, give you a pat on the back?

Also, don’t tell me black people have no choice and all that shit. If they really wanted, they’d find a way to move out of that community and head out to something better.[/quote]
This is just not correct. It’s not “black people” who do these things, it’s criminals who walk around shooting people. It’s unfair to assume that “black people” and “criminals” are synonymous. There are criminals of all races. And yes, some criminals are black. But what the hell is the “white community”? You make it sound like all black people are poor and in trouble with the law, while all white people are the law.

And unless you’ve lived in the ghetto you really don’t know how difficult it is to make a life for yourself when you’re in that kind of situation. It’s not as easy as saying to yourself “You know, I’m going to get out of this poor town and make a life for myself and be successful!”

Read full topic

item.title: Racism? Mature Discussion!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I like the way this post has gone off topic

Racism is just dumb. Hating someone because they’re not like you? I mean are you fucking kidding me?
Now some black people, they do bring it on themselves. When you walk around shooting people and acting all big like a “nigger”, what do you expect the white community to do, give you a pat on the back?

Also, don’t tell me black people have no choice and all that shit. If they really wanted, they’d find a way to move out of that community and head out to something better.

Racism also leads to other topics about religion and sexuality but that’s off topic.

Read full topic
